subcommands.help: Lists all commands you have permissions to use.
Lists every command, even the ones, you don't have permissions to use.
Lists the help page for a particular command.
Write a welcome message into the chat.
Welcomes a user with a random welcoming message.
Writes a random number from 1 to 6.
Writes a random number from <minimum> to <maximum>.

command.help.ywc: I will ignore the fact, that I don't have feelings and that your gratefulness can't touch me. So: You're welcome!
